First time having a VPS in Belgium, let alone the legendary Ryzen here! thanks for your offer on the first day of the year! @marvel

Geekbench 5 test failed. Run manually to determine cause.

I/O Speed is ok, but not the best NVME I have had. Port speed is quite nice. But no idea why GB5 score could not run

Please be aware the NVMe is shared CEPH storage connected over infiniband network to the node. Plus it's triple replicated. You can't compare it to a local NVMe drive which is obv. a lot faster. But with local NVMe you have no HA.

Thanks for your order
